Public Class MessageQueueEnumerator Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
public ref class MessageQueueEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type MessageQueueEnumerator = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IEnumerator interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一个只进游标，以枚举通过消息队列中的消息。

span.span: Provides a forward-only cursor to enumerate through messages in a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于与网络上的队列进行动态交互。Use for dynamic interaction with queues on the network. 通过类提供的方法可以返回一个包含动态队列列表的, 也可以返回一个数组, 该数组包含调用指定方法时队列集合的快照。Methods available through the class can return either a containing a dynamic list of queues, or an array that contains a snapshot of the queue collection at the time the specified method was called. 网络中未定义队列的顺序。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 它们不是按顺序进行排序, 例如, 按计算机、标签、公共或私有状态或其他用户可访问的条件。They are not ordered, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or other user-accessible criteria. 是游标, 初始化为动态列表的开头。A is a cursor, initialized to the head of a dynamic list. 可以通过调用将光标移到枚举的第一个队列。You can move the cursor to the first queue of the enumeration by calling . 枚举器初始化完成后, 可以使用前进到剩余队列。After the enumerator has been initialized, you can use to step forward through the remaining queues. 不可能向后移动。It is not possible to step backward with a . 游标只允许在队列枚举中向前移动。A cursor only allows forward movement through the queue enumeration. 但是, 可以调用来重置枚举, 并将光标再次置于列表的开头。However, you can call to reset the enumeration and put the cursor at the beginning of the list again. 由于枚举器是动态的, 因此, 枚举数追加到游标当前位置之外的队列可以由枚举器访问。Because the enumerator is dynamic, a queue that is appended beyond the cursor's current position can be accessed by the enumerator. 如果不首先调用 Reset, 则无法访问在游标当前位置之前插入的队列。A queue that is inserted before the cursor's current position cannot be accessed without first calling Reset. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将循环访问网络中的所有消息队列, 并检查每个队列的路径。The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue. 最后, 它显示网络上公用队列的数量。Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CPP/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CS/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/VB/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与枚举数关联的资源。

span.span: Frees the resources associated with the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作系统在游标的生存期内将打开的句柄保留到队列枚举器。The operating system retains an open handle, , to the queue enumerator during the lifetime of the cursor. 使用完枚举器后, 调用以释放与句柄关联的资源。When you finish working with the enumerator, call to release the resources associated with the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As MessageQueue
public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ Current { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the current of the enumeration.
The queue at which the cursor is currently positioned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建枚举器后, 它不会指向任何内容, 因此无效, 如果访问, 将引发异常。When the enumerator is created, it does not point to anything, so is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed. 您必须调用以将游标定位到枚举中的第一个队列。You must call to position the cursor at the first queue in the enumeration. 对没有干预调用的多个调用将返回相同的对象。Multiple calls to with no intervening calls to will return the same object.

exception.span: 您在第一次调用 之前调用了 。

span.span: You called before the first call to .

exception.span: 游标位于枚举中的第一个队列之前。

span.span: The cursor is located before the first queue in the enumeration.
-or-

exception.span: 您在对 的调用返回假（指示游标位于枚举中的最后一个队列之后）后调用了 。

span.span: You called after a call to had returned false (indicating the cursor is located after the last queue in the enumeration).

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose method

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

span.span: Releases the resources held by the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法;在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的 Finalize 方法, 除非通过对方法的调用禁用了垃圾回收器终止。Application code should not call this method; an object's Finalize method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100))、[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

The native handle to the current queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不再需要此实例, 请调用以释放资源的此句柄。When you no longer need this instance, call to free this handle to the resource.

span.span: The handle does not exist.

exception.span: 调用代码没有浏览权限。

span.span: The calling code does not have browse permissions.

abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: 如果当前有可用的枚举数，使该枚举数前进到枚举的下一个队列。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next queue of the enumeration, if one is currently available.

returns.span: 如果枚举数成功地前进到了下一个队列，则为 ；如果枚举数已经到达枚举的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next queue; if the enumerator has reached the end of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`没有与枚举关联的队列, 则立即返回。 returns `false` immediately if there are no queues associated with the enumeration. 将返回`true` , 直到它到达集合的末尾。 will return `true` until it has reached the end of the collection. 然后, 它将`false`针对每个连续调用返回。It will then return `false` for each successive call. 但一旦返回`false`, 访问属性将引发异常。However once has returned `false`, accessing the property will throw an exception. 创建时, 枚举器在概念上放置在第一个枚举之前, 第一次调用会使枚举的第一个队列进入视图。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first of the enumeration, and the first call to brings the first queue of the enumeration into view.

exception.span: 调用代码没有浏览权限。

span.span: The calling code does not have browse permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed
abstract member Reset : unit -> unit override this.Reset : unit -> unit

summary.span: 重置游标，使其指向枚举的开头。

span.span: Resets the cursor, so it points to the beginning of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器按只进方向移动。An enumerator moves in a forward-only direction. 使用此方法返回到队列的枚举的开头。Use this method to return to the beginning of the enumeration of queues. 将游标定位到列表中的第一个队列。 positions the cursor at the first queue in the list. 在调用 后, 您无需调用将游标向前移动到枚举中的第一个队列。You do not need to call after calling to move the cursor forward to the first queue in the enumeration.

The queue at which the cursor is currently positioned.
